Class BasicRolesAdminXACMLIT

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class BasicRolesAdminXACMLIT
extends org.fcrepo.auth.roles.basic.integration.BasicRolesAdminIT
    This test reuses the existing basic admin roles test, against the XACML PDP and global policies.
    Author:
    Gregory Jansen
